Adelaide: she gets a scroll of pinpoint and gives it to dvolta to learn and cast and um. they cast it Erasmus's soul, its flickering in and out like a radio frequency which is not how the spell works! it is in the dead center of Valane abt 100ft off the ground. D'volta: decided to take a break to teleport to the edge of the world, oh shit theres an edge of the world. teleports around if you hit it. theres a center to the world, there isnt supposed to be! world is 4000miles in radius in hemisphere, maybe sphere, yet to confirm downward direction. giant guardian beasts that dont like ppl messing with it. extremely high level magic, check it out later? center is in the tristate area!
Sinani: sinani meets w person he got the handmedowns from! name is Lillyanna and is the mirror of Elowen . She a ghorran, has a plant creature for an eidolon. theyve been fighting devils in the plane of earth, but the devils have become very busy with something else. elowan was lonely and talked to the mirror, and thats how lillyanna came about by being dragged out there. new friend and ally for planar stuffs! :D Yivin: safehouse is safe! druid that came down decided to stay and help with the hospital!
Korkau: finally parted ways, and established bffs forever. korkau can call him up if ever need to. buddy is Aijinghou Vani: village is turning more into a city now! so many ppl here! they decide it needs a name, so they named it Stonehaven in honor of vani :D (cries). he learned how to bake bread! LEVEL 15

sessions/chosen-by-gods/session-37.html.title: Session 37
sessions/chosen-by-gods/session-37.html.description:
Prev Session: Session 36
Next Session: Session 38 dvolta has sent a scrying package to the center of the continent dvolta sees the package move from carrier to carrier, up the river, as far up the river as they can
dropped off with Varial Arden in the form of a woman she carries it up the mountain, dangerous, goes thru tunnels and caves looks annoyed abt it the whole time tbh arrives at a small flat plateau at the top of the mountain, as if the top of the mountain was cut off inscribed with long faded runes and symbols, mossy and craggy agreed to cast illusory scene so we can see it happening varial waits and the rocks begin to move, and they shake off the moss and dirt since the last time they stood up a giant lizard with big wings & gold scales, a dragon, awakens "ahh, little devil what brings you here?" "theres a group that thinks they can break the seal, im here to show them that they cannot" "ahh, good, yes, show the runes" he sits up to show the entrance of a cave varial enters, it is covered in ancient paintings, color mostly faded but still visual 8 beings fighting off a great creature, beings on 1 side, spells and weapons, great heroes creature on opposite side, massive darkness with many arms, swarms of smaller creatures crawl from the sea & shambling creatures covered in blue crystals the heroes seal the creature away because they couldnt defeat it, and the symbols of our gods are shown on the beings the translucent forms of the figures are on their bodies the heroes are generally becloaked its hard to make out, youd have to go there to restore the painting one who has a light pink cloak, with the symbol of a half sun on the back A S I some of the inscriptions have letters under them, the figures are labeled arent super clear dragon must be more than a thousand years old "What's depicted in the cave you're guarding?" This is the Great Sacrifice that saved many worlds. An important and cautionary tale. Throughout history it's common enough that the Chosen It seems like the last 600 years the Chosen have been kept super weak and not kept together
As soon as the The Holy Order of the Lawful Patriarch gets everyone together, the marks jump around It was very common for a group to be chosen and they would rise to great power, but not do anything with that power, or be corrupted, or be hunted down by their friend, the raiders interfere a lot Sometimes a group would get lost in the mountains "How old are you? (dragon)" I'm from the... dawn of time (unsure inflection?) The timeline goes past 1k, but gets funky the earlier in age so ppl think there just wasnt a lot of stuff You can find ruins from before 1k years, but they're very very destroyed There's scriptures of the gods from before who would intervene "The Lady of Art"
Hurgen Valificus - The Great Nephew of the Right Hand Rithous Valificus the 3rd Just a normal super high level cleric (9 or 10, maybe) Becloaked advanced automatons working on the wall
The city is run by Lord Netherrim
Valane impeccably clean, many automatons and robots without souls Sometimes people go by, hurrying by Human and Elven-ish Seem to be a couple large families

sessions/chosen-by-gods/session-38.html.title: Session 38
sessions/chosen-by-gods/session-38.html.description:
Prev Session: Session 37
Next Session: Session 39
creature in tower is all the souls that perished in Netherrim] as a being
it was just taking the form of Erasmus because it thought it would be comforting
it's trying to go back in time to kill Lucius Valerius and prevent it's own creation which would fuck up a lot of things! it believes its creation was a great injustice. its right, but Adelaide and it talked trying to convince it to change it's ways, it responds with. this is why im here this is my purpose adelaides like. well my purpose was farming and i sucked but i found a new one! and its like. well that sucks for you. this is MY purpose more of that party is starting to talk like. ok should we kill it right we fight it adelaide kills it shatters into a bunch of pieces they start to fizzle and fade away one sticks around and leaves a scratch on adelaides chest over where her heart would be we do call the spirit! adelaide asks her dad some questions adelaide asks whatever happened when she was put to sleep erasmus was sent to war and didnt want to create beings with souls to fight (they wanted to send adelaide) and he didnt want to do that so he made a bunch of soulless automatons the elders called him to fight (everyone got called to fight) it didnt go well, obvs
erasmus's creations are what killed Maya Blossomflower
all the automatons in Valane are derived from his creations, so he takes responsibility for them adelaide asks her dad if he wants to come back, he says he doesnt know if he deserves to, but adelaide offers to help give him a second chance sinani's gonna make him a new body bc the old one is Old and he was struggling and that's why he built adelaide many tears were shed LEVEL UP 16

sessions/chosen-by-gods/session-39.html.title: Session 39
sessions/chosen-by-gods/session-39.html.description:
Prev Session: Session 38
Next Session: Session 40
Erasmus now has a new body. sneeple
we leave him with Thraine Bronzeteeth at The Dropped Anchor so they can be old man inventors together dvolta starts calling spirits a bunch of the former chosen TLDR they had powerful items we plan on retrieving
The Thorned Rose has the Apex item from Lyldaa the Lucky
Maya Blossomflower did not like automatons, upset dvolta bitter at the previous chosen
Vivian talk time
shes got a grimoire that Lucius Valeriuswanted, in Hazelden we convince her to tell us the location time to pull up to said location
Grimwood big big tree guy walks out
we talk to vivian's husband Eoghan Lark! he's not dead! he knows that lucius tried to frame him hes been protecting the belongings after his name was cleared up tree made from his grief over his wife :( if we kill it we can have her stuff we kill it (dvolta crit disintegrate 214 dmg) we retrieve her stuff and theres a box with small bits of all the chosen's magic stuff time to track them down! vani gets a tattoo :)

sessions/chosen-by-gods/session-40.html.title: Session 40
sessions/chosen-by-gods/session-40.html.description:
Prev Session: Session 39
Next Session: Session 41 dvolta taxi to a mansion
Thunderfen Mansion one of their ancestors has the magic items
we convince them to give them to us so we can stop Lucius Valerius
dvolta taxi to the The Holy Order of the Lawful Patriarch dvolta makes illusionary copies of the magic items they have on display vani thief moment now we dvolta taxi to excavation site there are 2 corrupted elementals there guarding the objects mercy kill we dig the items up eeps dvolta taxi to the middle of the ocean
Rose pirate captain she asks if we're there to take her sword and mantle yes we are she asks for a duel with whoever wants the items vani time he wins
she is helping to attack Blackfrost ships now that the Vurze Family is back in charge and not the Cu'Onda Family bye bye teleport away

sessions/chosen-by-gods/session-41.html.title: Session 41
sessions/chosen-by-gods/session-41.html.description:
Prev Session: Session 40
Next Session: Session 42
We d'Volta taxi to The Temple Of Death :)
theres a giant fuckin shadow plane skeleton down there
people claim its Nex Umbra its not we have to get rid of it to get the items there or it would cause Many Problems prob. not worth it rn nah
we go to The Grove of Cycles to the monastery
we ask abt Vidrin the Serene's items they're being guarded by the spirits of the kids he protected who became Real Good at martial arts and then decided to dedicate themselves to protecting his stuff we decide we dont need his stuff either fuck that guy (/j) 4 days downtime
we go to Welterglow! Yivin and Vani check in on the field hospital and help expand it
Adelaide hangs out with Erasmus and has some father daughter tinkering time
we go to Valane! we find the people there they are. on the fucking struggle bus. no more overseer means no more clockwork means NO MORE ANYTHING they are STARVING!!!!!!! they dont have NAMES!!!!
we meet 93 (hes important to me) we gather them all into the Planar Palace and they eat real food for the first time we build a boat over 4 more days d'Volta fucking levels the city of Valane
we take the people to Stonehaven the mayor and people of stonehaven are like. oh! oh my!!! uh!!! but they CANT say no because we saved them,,,, sweats
its okay we help them settle in and we build houses and they get to pet Sunshine first puppy experience EVER!!! it goes well bc Sunshine is the goodest girl in the whole wide world some people are choosing names! 93 keeps his name number because he's proud of it! we go fucking beat up Pride now so help me god

sessions/chosen-by-gods/session-42.html.title: Session 42
sessions/chosen-by-gods/session-42.html.description:
Prev Session: Session 41
Next Session: Session 43 sending the shadow money wizard gang
ask them where Ernog Snowgleam is
Caius Thaine is busy doing "binding rituals. he's looking for darvaca stronger then the nightwing. he'll be gone a while searching and wearing them down to put them under his control." pull up to his location sneak into the town hall d'volta suggests the normal guy leave so we can talk to pride he's very interested in showing us to the plateau (dragon area) (wink wink nudge nudge) he cant go himself bc obvs hes just a wizard lord apprentice (lol)
and not one of Lucius Valerius's spies haha the nightwing is there hi guy
pride has plans he cannot share with us about spreading the blackfrost he asked us whether or not Korkau was or was not undead we didnt wanna tell him! ominous!!!! repeated that caius wanted to meet with sinani when he was stronger asked adelaide if she was a metal elemental or a construct why was he asking abt that...... he is secretly a fleshwarp btw didnt really feel like changing his ways adelaide i think we're gonna have to kill this guy. dang :( adelaide killed this guy sent mr nightwing back to entropy land
we go to the Grove Druids
Dide swimming in pond time to go find caius! level up!

sessions/chosen-by-gods/session-43.html.title: Session 43
sessions/chosen-by-gods/session-43.html.description:
Prev Session: Session 42
Next Session: Session 44
time to find Caius Thaine]
we go to the shadow plane
teleport to the Nameless Islands see big creepy door with 2 man-worms and a "stag guy" dvolta makes stag guy go for a walk we beat up the worms stag guy comes back
we beat him too
caius is summoning the Harbinger of the Apocalypse we have a few days to interrupt him or um. apocalypse :) (plenty of time to stock up and ready to fight) interrupting the ritual can have the bird temporarily fight caius with us but it will fight us if we stop it from leaving

sessions/chosen-by-gods/session-44.html.title: Session 44
sessions/chosen-by-gods/session-44.html.description:
Prev Session: Session 43
Next Session: Session 45 dvolta crafting we go through the door
hi Caius Thaine] he has a bunch of Sinani Husks working on the Giant Bird Ritual we tells sin to come back later bc hes not ready for the vessel yet sinani says actually no. wtf??? we're here to stop u he keeps being a dick says sinani isnt a person >:( we go. well in that case laser eye beams laser eye beams laser eye beams sinani kills him sinani point blank fireballs him actually we let the bird go back to the void we'll deal with it later <3
we take the sinani husks and caius and bury them in Vivian's husband grove we make sure that caius has a restful death forever which is the biggest fuck you for a necromancer
we get the message from the The Druidic Order of Blood and Brine that they found where Lucius Valerius is fear.png level up to 18

sessions/chosen-by-gods/session-45.html.title: Session 45
sessions/chosen-by-gods/session-45.html.description:
Prev Session: Session 44
Next Session: Session 46
we show up to one of the entrances to Lucius Valerius]'s house theres some disguised demons there we kill them easily dvolta goes into a wizard stupor we go into the next practice fight vani controlled trenches its ok because we still manage to kill the thing sinani's blood is on vani's hands.

sessions/chosen-by-gods/session-46.html.title: Session 46
sessions/chosen-by-gods/session-46.html.description:
Prev Session: Session 45
Next Session: Session 47 we walk into an old vault it appears to not have been open for like 600 years vani picks the lock oh boy devils! we fight to the death and return them to their plane
theres another door that Lucius Valerius is on the other side of! he cant leave bc he disabled teleportation here THAT ALSO MEANS WE CANT ESCAPE LOL lvl 19!

sessions/chosen-by-gods/session-47.html.title: Session 47
sessions/chosen-by-gods/session-47.html.description:
Prev Session: Session 46
Next Session: Session 48 we opened the door
Lucius Valerius and Valerio Rend lucius revealed that he cant really die until he finishes his deal with something (the god or the algolthu) he admitted he never cared about his friends him dying is just a minor inconvience not that minor but yknow whoa disintegrate be upon ye we kill him hes dead for now? lvl 20

sessions/chosen-by-gods/session-48.html.title: Session 48
sessions/chosen-by-gods/session-48.html.description:
Prev Session: Session 47
Next Session: Session 49
we check in finally with Faun Coren using sending theres no response we go uh oh
scry on Caylon] he's there with "the priest" and a baby (that only dvolta knows about) "the priest" is like. we got the last 2 ppl that you needed to open the gate :) you should definitely do that. itll benefit all of us :) vanis like oh that sounds great lets do it we have a discussion whether or not we should actually do it
we end up making a deal, they return all the orphans to Welterglow and also we get a couple of days between killing the dragon and releasing the Eater of Worlds theyre like. yeah thats good cool we pull up to the dragon talk to him he was friends with the ppl who sealed the Eater of Worlds we beat him up but we dont kill him bc hes nice the Aeon pulls up through a rift in reality dvolta says oh hi again AGAIN???? the Aeon starts projecting images into our brain

sessions/chosen-by-gods/session-49.html.title: Session 49
sessions/chosen-by-gods/session-49.html.description:
Prev Session: Session 48
Next Session: Session 50 the aeon that showed up starts talking to us thru images
it shows us the Eater of Worlds and also, with great difficulty, tells us the eater's name Avincatp names have great significance to cosmic entities then it warns us about getting corrupted by the creature (actually about getting grappled lol) we convince the aeon to possess vani instead of the algolthu possessing him rest for 2 days
we get brought Caylon and a GLOWING BABY??
man wonder where this baby came from (Areia Cu'Onda's baby) we have all the chosen so we open the gate we find the big glowing seal next to the still animated bodies of the original people that sealed it Adelaide releases them from their duty we fight the Eater of Worlds we beat his ass the bubble has popped the world is trying to fit the continent back into its rightful place we did it! holy shit!
the Maronda Shipping Company ships set sail

sessions/chosen-by-gods/session-50-epilo.title: Session 50 - Epilogue
sessions/chosen-by-gods/session-50-epilo.description:
Prev Session: Session 49 after the cosmic battle Vani
vani reunited with caylon, looks at vani for guidance
no more Tempestas Filinna mark, only a shadow that looks like a birthmark on his cheek "hell yeah stab dad" "i learned that from the sailors at the dock" "stab dad???" "no! hell!" Yivin all the children are happy they have a bed and that its personalized "i want to stay for a while until everything is settled, make sure everything is calm and theyre supported" yivin is gonna go explore around the continent oh god faun doesnt know abt the bubble Dvolta
goes home Welterglow creating an illusory scene, explaining the events of the last 30 years, duration is a day, keeps repeating digging up his family keeping them separated in case they get resurrected earlier no complications dvoltas father comes up and puts a hand on his shoulder and starts crying "my son, you're a man!" "guess i'm the oldest now" "we were much more worried about you than the business, i'm so glad you're okay." "i've always been the lucky one." passes along the business but keeps a few ships "there's another bit coming after i become a wizard lord, but let's enjoy a month together." adelaide
a few weeks later, adelaide makes the trip to medium sized parish area where she learned about being in the The Holy Order of the Lawful Patriarch
Siobhan and Carolinn come to greet adelaide
"the right hand, he passed away, and his grandnephew was supposed to succeed him but the grandnephew is nowhere to be found. there's all sorts of reports of the gods breaking their silence. a friend of mine saw a cloaked figure made of stars looking around, observing. nex umbra was there! had a star in one hand, and the sky in the other. nex umbra has been seen! others are claiming miracles by others we've never heard of!" adelaide tells them about the "gods" and her dad Sinani
many miles to the north east in Fallencall meets with dvolta to discuss making a school in the area, heal up the earth from Evil Energies
oh god he offers talking with Caelus Thaine! we will get back to those 10 questions Dvolta
scrying and scouring the seabed to get Areia Cu'Onda sinani unstones her the angel was working for the squid monsters she takes her baby and 3000 gold and leaves adelaide after months, she puts the finishing touches on the farmhouse (with indoor plumbing invented and added!)
youre not going back out and journeying the lands? Erasmus my main goal was to come home :pleading: she and her dad go on a road trip :) Sinani
Vinry and Oaky get given the collar of eternal bond and stampede medallion Vani city is doing well!
goes home Stonehaven
Sunshine HAS BABIES.... 5 TINY LITTLE PUPPIES Yivin Someone runs up and says theres an accident at the dockyard a group of young healers are scurrying around his apprentice We each go to sleep and find ourselves in a council room with each other and also d'volta and d'volta is VERY THERE Word of Recall We all teleport to where D'volta is Mansion in Welterglow where he's almost done with a teleportation spell Window full of stars behind him We arrive at a place where the sun is beginning to rise, but it was nowhere near rising in Welterglow There's a ship docked down the coast a few ways on a sandy beach There's an island with a bluegreen jungle Tall spires of stone reaching up above the canopy that has a flat tip Mountains that are flattened on top instead of pointed Jungle doesnt reach all the way to the top Magnificent Mansion We're on the old/new world No one else made it to the other side yet The sand is pink In the magnificent mansion theres a crack from the baby dragon egg Leafy creature body Wiggles in the sand seems happy in the sand the jungle is the same color of the dragon's leaves NOT avasoryd dvolta lets us know that we're basically the first ppl simultaneously landing in the new world! hes made potions so we can live longer? whoa he couldve invited us to dinner but this is his equivalent so its ok he does a magnificent mansion OH GOD THE EGG IS CRACKING itty bitty baby leafy dragon waddles out into sand like sea turtle its where it is happy!! the jungle is the same color as its leaves it imprints on yivin we set up another recall so we can meet every year :') THE END.

info_attractionForce.description: How much should linked nodes attract each other? This will make the graph appear more clustered.

info_maxNodeRadius.description: How large should the largest nodes be? Nodes are sized by how many links they have. The larger a node is the more it will attract other nodes. This can be used to create a good grouping around the most important nodes.
